column1: Several spells of showers will occur in Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-Western provinces
and in Kandy, Nuwara-Eliya, Galle and Matara districts.
Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Uva province and in Ampara and
Batticaloa districts during the evening or night.
Fairly strong winds about (40-45) kmph can be expected at times in western slopes of the
central  hills,  Northern,  North-Central  and  North-western  provinces,  and  in  Monaragala,
General  public  is  kindly  requested  to  take  adequate  precautions  to  minimize  damages
caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
